00012   typedef std::map<std::string, timing_t> timing_map;

00020   timing_t get(const std::string& name) const {
00021     timing_map::const_iterator i = timings.find(name);
00022     return (i != timings.end()) ? i->second : 0;
00023   }

00052     write(out, print_total);
00053     clear();
00054   }
00055

00058     return get(name); 
00059   }
